title: Elegant Ruby & Diamond Necklace - Modern Haaram
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with White Gold accents. Features oval-cut Rubies and brilliant-cut Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Haaram, this necklace features a delicate chain interspersed with geometric links of yellow gold. Oval-cut rubies are beautifully contrasted against a backdrop of sparkling diamonds. The center pendant showcases a symmetrical design culminating in a single, pear-shaped ruby drop. The setting uses a prong setting style to allow maximum light to each stone.
colors: and deep red. The vibrant red of the rubies adds a touch of royalty
while the diamonds bring a dazzling brilliance.
occasions: or a sophisticated evening out. Suitable for both traditional occasions and modern celebrations. Can be styled with a saree or a western gown.
description: This necklace blends modern design with the timeless appeal of rubies and diamonds. Its versatile design makes it suitable for a variety of occasions. The quality of craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty. Rubies symbolize love and passion, making this a meaningful gift.
